text: Ulfric calls, and I hunt—for his enemies are meat undeserving breath
An ancient, guttural cry that sends fear through enemy ranks and fire into his allies.
His claw-swipes tear through shield and sinew with brutal efficiency.
The redder his pelt, the faster he strikes—wounded or not.
Where others bleed, he heals—cursed flesh reshaping around bone and will.
Those under the yoke of Chaos tremble—Haftagg knows how to unchain them violently.
He remembers every traitor—and his claws never forget.
Ulfric’s champion commands respect—and fear—wherever the Bjornling banners fly.
haftagg's devotion to Olric is as fiery as his Norse heritage driven lust for plunder and battle.
When Haftagg howls, even hardened warriors feel the thrill—and fear—of the hunt.
Haftagg fights with maddened strength near his High King, entering a bloodlust state rarely witnessed.
A soul-piercing Skinwolf cry that causes Terror and lowers enemy leadership for a time.
Local Recruitment duration: %+n turn for all Marauder Champion and Huscarl units
